feed.title: Solution for blockchain congestion and determination of block size by bitcoin network/protocol itself.

entry.title: Solution for blockchain congestion and determination of block size by bitcoin network/protocol itself.
entry.summary: A proposal similar to one by the recipient of this message, Washington Sanchez, is mentioned in a communication from David Vorick via the bitcoin-dev mailing list. Vorick asks for clarification on the purpose of the block size limit in order to have a productive discussion regarding the proposal. The link provided leads to the text of Sanchez's BIP 107.
